decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Proposed floor plan, undated; Planning Statement, April 2015 - received 07/05/2015; Transport Statement 108600/602, dated April 2015; Framework Travel Plan 108600/601, dated April 2015. - received 13/05/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall commence on site until a detailed Travel Plan has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  The Travel Plan shall include details of implementation and monitoring and shall be implemented in accordance with these agreed details.  The results of the implementation and monitoring shall be made available to the Local Planning Authority on request, together with any changes to the plan arising from those results.  The Travel Plan shall set targets for modal split and include measures to discourage travel by car.  It shall also have reference to the availability of parking spaces and ensure that measures are in place to prevent adverse impacts from drop-off including discouraging parents from parking in unsafe locations (eg. at junctions) and in locations that would lead to conflicts with neighbours (eg. Parking over driveways).

Condition : 4 - The premises shall be used as a children's day nursery and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 5 - The use hereby permitted for children's day nursery purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times Monday to Friday 0700-1900 and at no times on Saturdays and Sundays.
description: Change of use from B1/D1 to a childrens day nursery
